summary: This mod improves the "hoovestep" sounds of the horses by adding "sound sets" for different surfaces.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Improved Horse Step Sounds v2 © 2015 Crystan

Special Edition Edition: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/848/?

[size=4][u][b]-> [color=#ff0000]Nexus exclusive mod[/color] <-[/b][/u][/size]
-> If the mod have been uploaded elsewhere, it happened without my permission. <-
-> I'll [color=#ffff00][size=3][b][i][u]never[/u][/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3] [/size][/color]allow my mod to be uploaded elsewhere. If you see it somewhere else, please contact me. <-[/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center]Version 2 has been released[/center]

[center]Changelog:

V2.1
- fixed randomly missing step sounds

V2
- slightly changed sounds
- added subtile "saddle/foley" sounds

This mod improves the "hoovestep" sounds of horses by adding "sound sets" for different grounds. That means all horses will have different step sounds for surfaces like snow, dirt, stone etc.

As usual, every sound is completely self made (recorded and edited).

Videos:
[youtube]B1EJiqhvcUY[/youtube]


Currently there are six sound sets supported:

Stone
Dirt
Grass
Gravel
Snow
Wood

Should be compatible with every horse mod.[/center]
[center]How to change the volume of the horse step sounds:

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31039-1-1368387404.png[/img]
Load up the IHSS.esp in the creation kit

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31039-3-1368387407.png[/img]
Select Audio->Sound Descriptor and enter horse in the Filter text box.
Now you can edit (double click) every entry shown in the screenshot. (ignore the grey marked entries)

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31039-4-1368387408.png[/img]
Now you can modify the static attenuation which changes the volume, you can preview your
changes immediately with the play button above the soundfile name box.

When you're done, save and start skyrim.[/center]

[b]Note:
Check the credits and distribution permission page for corresponding informations.

Since I've got various PM's: Theres really no way to convince me to get my permission to upload any of my mods to another site, sorry. All of my Skyrim mods are Nexus exclusive.

[/b]

[center]
Checkout my other Mods for Skyrim:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17903/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/17903-2-1368962766.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22648][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/22648-2-1368962752.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]Better Weapon Swing Sounds[/b] and [b]Dagger Sounds 4 Daggers[/b]


Recommended Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35957/?]Reverb and Sound - Reverb Module[/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70640/?]Horses Revamped[/url][/center]

[center]--------------------------------------

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact me here or via E-mail: CrystanSeaAge@gmx.de

Support me by checking out my free game "Super Arkatis"!
(a shmup inspired by Tyrian and Raptor)

[size=1][url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.AtomicGear.SuperArkatis][img]http://i.imgur.com/MJJUymK.gif[/img][/url][/size][size=1]
[/size][size=1]

 [url='http://community.playstarbound.com/index.php?resources/chocobo-mounts.1833/'][/url][url=https://soundcloud.com/crystan-seaage][img]http://i.imgur.com/3JgM9Jk.png[/img][/url][/size]

[url=http://www.indiedb.com/games/ufo-alien-invasion]UFO: Alien Invasion[/url][/center]
